resources.name: Andariel's Visage
secondary: Attacks release a Poison Nova that deals 350–450% weapon damage as Poison to enemies within 10 yards.

resources.name: Broken Crown
secondary: Whenever a gem drops, a gem of the type socketed into this item also drops.

resources.name: Leoric's Crown
secondary: Increase the effect of any gem socketed into this item by 75–100%.
